mfa.title: MFA Authenticators
mfa.description: Manage the MFA enrollments for your account.
mfa.delete_mfa_content: Are you sure you want to delete this MFA factor? This action cannot be undone.

errors.phone_number_required: Phone number is required for SMS enrollment.
errors.email_required: Email is required for Email enrollment.

unsupported_challenge_type.sms: SMS Verifier is disabled for your tenant. You can turn it on from dashboard turning on "SMS" on Guardian MFA section.
unsupported_challenge_type.totp: OTP Verifier is disabled for your tenant. You can turn it on from dashboard turning on "Push notifications" on Guardian MFA section (Push notications include OTP).
unsupported_challenge_type.push-notification: Auth0 Verifier is disabled for your tenant. You can turn it on from dashboard turning on "Push notifications" on Guardian MFA section.

access_denied.email: Could not find the requested authenticator

sms.title: Phone Message
sms.description: Users will receive a phone message with a verification code

push-notification.title: Push Notification using Auth0 Guardian
push-notification.description: Provide a push notification using Auth0 Guardian.

totp.title: One-time Password
totp.description: Provide a one-time password using Google Authenticator or similar.

email.title: Email
email.description: Users will receive an email message containing a verification code.

duo.title: Duo Security
duo.description: Use your DUO account for Multi-factor Authentication.

webauthn-roaming.title: WebAuthn with FIDO Security Keys
webauthn-roaming.description: Use WebAuthn-compliant security keys (e.g., FIDO2) as a second factor.

webauthn-platform.title: WebAuthn with FIDO Device Biometrics
webauthn-platform.description: Use WebAuthn-compliant device biometrics as a second factor.

recovery-code.title: Recovery Code
recovery-code.description: Use a unique recovery code to regain account access.

show_otp.title: Scan the barcode with your authenticator app
show_otp.enter_code: Enter the code from your authenticator app
